description: Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation
author: frack113
name: Powershell Token Obfuscation - Process Creation
query: (((process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/w/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/`/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/w/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/-/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/./ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/`/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/w/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/s/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/)) OR ((process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/"/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/{/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/d/ OR process.command_line.text:/}/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/"/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/s/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/-/ OR process.command_line.text:/f/)) OR ((process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/$/ OR process.command_line.text:/{/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/e/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/n/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/v/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/`/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/e/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/n/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/v/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/:/ OR process.command_line.text:/p/ OR process.command_line.text:/a/ OR process.command_line.text:/t/ OR process.command_line.text:/h/ OR process.command_line.text:/}/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/$/ OR process.command_line.text:/{/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/e/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/n/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/v/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/`/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/e/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/n/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/v/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/:/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/p/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/a/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/t/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/h/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/`/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/p/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/a/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/t/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/h/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/}/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/$/ OR process.command_line.text:/{/ OR process.command_line.text:/e/ OR process.command_line.text:/n/ OR process.command_line.text:/v/ OR process.command_line.text:/:/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/p/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/a/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/t/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/h/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/`/ OR process.command_line.text:/(/ OR process.command_line.text:/p/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/a/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/t/ OR process.command_line.text:/|/ OR process.command_line.text:/h/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/*/ OR process.command_line.text:/)/ OR process.command_line.text:/+/ OR process.command_line.text:/}/)))
